titleStmt.title: The speech of the Right Honourable Henry Powle, Esq., speaker of the House of Commons delivered to the King and Queen's Majesties, at the banqueting-house in White-Hall, Friday, April 12, 1689, with His Majesty's answer thereto.
titleStmt.author: Powle, Henry, 1630-1692.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Charles Bill and Thomas Newcomb ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Duke University Library.
Attributed to Henry Powle. cf. NUC pre-1956.
